events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to know how I can get a refund as soon as possible.
Issue categorized as Refund based on customer's request for money back due to incorrect item.
Support agent Jane Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, I’m Jane from support. I’m here to help you with your refund for the wrong item delivered.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I received.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help resolving this so quickly.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
